Thanks for checking out my very first game, PH0B0S.

Some Features:
Battle hordes of strange viruses through a series of hand-crafted levels. Hidden within levels are power-ups and weapons to enhance your abilities! Explore to your heart's contentment!
A variety of movement options: jump, dive, blast off of surfaces, hook yourself up walls and more!
Each level has several variations, ensuring that every playthrough is fresh and provides a new challenge.
Your enemy is an ever-changing threat. Some enemies can fuse with others to become larger and more dangerous! Watch out!

Some Movement / Combat Techniques:
Hook Climbing:
Attacking upward into a wall with the Starhook will propel you up it.

Beam Climbing:
Firing the Attraction Beam at walls will cause you to spiral towards them, as long as you're in range.

Hammer Jumping:
Attacking at a downward angle with the Comet Hammer into walls or the ground will launch you away.

Attack Cancelling:
Firing your gun in the middle of an attack will cause it to end early, at the expense of a bullet.

Weapon Combos:
You can switch weapons mid attack to form a string of attacks.
